text:
A PUT request with the following "If" request header:

  If: (<DAV:no-lock>)

is supposed to fail with status 412, but executes the PUT.
creator: julian.reschke@gmx.de

text:
Created attachment 16828
proposed fix for handling of unknown state tokens in mod_dav

The current behaviour is caused by the fix for bug 16452; attached patch
improves handling of unknown state tokens in mod_dav so that they are evaluated
to false at the right time.
creator: jorton@redhat.com

text:
Fixed on the trunk, thanks for the report.

http://svn.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi?view=rev&rev=329562
creator: jorton@redhat.com
